summary: After learning the sad truth about a patient, a female psychiatrist falls in love with him.
cast: Salman Khan|Kareena Kapoor|Rimi Sen|Jackie Shroff|Om Puri|Sunil Shetty|Arun Bakshi|Manoj Joshi|Asrani|Sulabha Arya|Kavi Kumar Azad|Nagesh Bhonsle|Shaurya Chauhan|Sabu Cyril|Kurush Deboo|Anil Dhawan|Saurabh Dubey|Javed Khan|Firdaus Mevawala|Atul Parchure|Claudiu-Cristian Prisecaru
title: Kyon Ki...
